data.name: The Gold River Project
data.detailed_description:
Want to be a part of the Alpha team? Check out our Indiegogo!


Hello Campers!
Head over to our Indiegogo page for more details.
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-gold-river-project


About the Game

You and three friends are offered a week long, remote camping trip. You quickly discover that you are not where you think you are.
You must find a way out.

Welcome to The Gold River Project, an open world survival adventure game.

FUN WITH FRIENDS:

Camp alone or bring along three friends to help you escape.

BUILD:

Craft tents and cabins to store supplies and survive the elements.

SCAVENGE:

Explore the world to find supplies, what you do not find you may be able to craft with the items you collect.

SOLVE:

Solve the various puzzles found within the Substations in order to accomplish the ultimate goal escaping.

SURVIVE:

Keep a close eye on your status hud to maintain your health as you fight through the changing seasons, wild animals and the occasional Settler camp.

data.short_description: You and three friends are offered a week long, remote camping trip. However, you quickly discover that you are not where you think you are. You must find a way out. An open world single player or 4 player co-operative survival adventure game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3800X 8-core
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti / AMD RX 6900 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection for multiplayer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: There is simulated shooting and killing of other players and animals. Minimal blood and gore.
